duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive business development and sales strategies to drive Windows 11 device refresh and sustainability solutions.
Lead and support pre-sales Windows 11 product and sustainability service conversations with clients.
Manage and foster client relationships, creating a pipeline for Windows 11 device refresh through the product's value and sustainability solutions.
Deliver engaging presentations, workshops, and webinars focused on the value of Windows 11 devices and Insight lifecycle services.
Lead and guide teammates in the creation and management of ongoing Windows go-to-market strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from a four-year university or combination of 1-3+ years of related professional work experience in technology consulting, sales or partner management with some technical certifications (e.g., Microsoft Power BI, Excel expertise)
